REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0475 reute b f BC-CANADA-ISSUES-80-BILL 06-02 0075

TEXT.TITLE: CANADA ISSUES 80 BILLION YEN EUROBOND
TEXT.BODY: Canada is issuing an 80 billion yen eurobond due June 25, 1992 paying 4-3/8 pct and priced at 101-1/2 pct, lead manager Nomura International Ltd said. The non-callable bond is available in denominations of one mln and 10 mln yen and will be listed in Luxembourg. The selling concession is 1-1/4 pct while management and underwriting combined pays 5/8 pct. Payment date is June 25. REUTER
